name: Calm Waters: A Point and Click Adventure
description: Tourists disappearing and blood-curdling screams from a mysterious island out to sea...What secrets does this holiday paradise hold? Perhaps it's time to find out...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 2.0GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce FX and up, Radeon 9500 and up, Intel 9xx DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card Additional Notes: Game offers multiple resolutions for faster/smoother gameplay.
